Sorry Guys, THIS IS HOW IT ACTUALY WORK

- Unlock TaskBar
- move to Top
- right Click Desktop
- Personalize
- Click Desktop Backround
- Change  Piscture Positon to fill or something until you see de watermark move down

then 

- Drag Taskbar down
- Lock Task Bar

it is working for me from release (29 Feb) and is still working

Please let me know
everytime you change your wallpaper or Install new GFX drivers you will need to do the above method.
